title: Detection of Most Dominant Transcripts (MDTs), MDT Switches and their Functional Impacts
text: Alternative splicing plays essential role development, tissue specificity essential cell functions. One gene can encode many transcripts, one transcripts might expressed significantly higher level transcripts. transcripts defined dominant transcripts (MDTs). cancer, canonical MDTs might switched transcripts call MDT switching event. R package aims find MDTs RNA-seq data evaluated MDT switching event flexible user-defined way. user can define cutoffs transcript expression, MDT enrichment.
